name: UniversalMobileToken

attributes.name: Ownable

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Substracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.documentation: @dev Finish minting process
attributes.name: finishMinting
transfer

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows another account/contract to spend some tokens on its behalf
  throws on any error rather then return a false flag to minimize user errors
    *   also, to minimize the risk of the approve/transferFrom attack vector
  approve has to be called twice in 2 separate transactions - once to
  change the allowance to 0 and secondly to change it to the new allowance
  value
    *   @param _spender      approved address
  @param _value       allowance amount
    *   @return true if the approval was successful
attributes.name: approve
transferFrom

attributes.documentation:
@dev Add an emitter account
  
  @param _emitter     emitter's address
attributes.name: addEmitter

attributes.documentation:
@dev Remove an emitter account
  
  @param _emitter     emitter's address
attributes.name: removeEmitter
batchMint
batchTransfer
burn
allowance
balanceOf
